36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Sa'eed narrated that the Messenger of Allah (S.a.w) said:"Whoever wants to be seen, Allah will show him, And whoever wants to be heard of, Allah will make him heard off." And he narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said: "He who shows no mercy to the people, Allah shows him no mercy

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرِّيَاءِ وَالسُّمْعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Showing Off And The Desire To Be Heard Of
